sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: Flow executors are facades that act as the highest-level entry points into Spring Web Flow, responsible for driving flow executions in a variety of environments.
In this chapter you'll learn how to execute flows within Spring MVC, Struts, and Java Server Faces (JSF) based applications.

sect1.title: Spring MVC integration
sect1.para: Spring Web Flow integrates with both servlet and portlet MVC, shipping with the core Spring Framework.

sect1.title: Struts integration
sect1.para: Spring Web Flow integrates with Struts 1.x or >.

sect1.title: Java Server Faces (JSF) integration
sect1.para: Spring Web Flow integrates with JSF.
